title: Bai Bian Ji Shou Zhi Luo Luo Lixian Ji
title_japanese: 百变机兽之洛洛历险记
synopsis: The 11-year-old "Lolo" is a genius game master, best at playing a 3D computer game called "King of Machines". This is a game with robots competing for supremacy against each other as a background game. Lolo has won the competition excellence award of this game many times. However, on a night of thunder and lightning, Lolo was no longer a bystander in this war. A strange beam of lightning injected powerful energy into Lolo’s computer and dragged him from the real world into the virtual world of the "War King" Inside, the story unfolds. (translated from baidu baike)
